definition: materialistic
yes
-ism/only/alone
thing/object/matter/abbr. for physics 物理
materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
dialectical materialism
pinyin: bian4 zheng4 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: the philosophy of materialism, doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
historical materialism (Marx's theory of history)
pinyin: li4 shi3 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: Relationalism is the essence of practical materialism and Piagets theory.
sentences.chinese: 关系论是实践唯物主义和皮亚杰学说的精华。

sentences.english: But theorists hold different viewpoints on the origin of historical materialism.
sentences.chinese: 但学术界在唯物史观诞生标志问题上，一直都有分歧。

sentences.english: The three leaps in materialist view of interests give rise to the three improvements of development view.
sentences.chinese: 唯物主义利益观的三次飞跃促成了发展观的三次提升。

sentences.english: The body that he, the materialist, had treated so contumeliously took its revenge on him.
sentences.chinese: 这位唯物论者曾极度蔑视肉体，如今肉体对他了报复。

sentences.english: Marxs theory of social forms is the important part of the historical materialism.
sentences.chinese: 社会形态理论是马克思唯物史观的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Scientific productivity theory is the foundation of Marxism materialist conception of history.
sentences.chinese: 科学的生产力理论是马克思主义唯物史观的基础。

sentences.english: The dialectical materialism philosophic thought is generally implied in theory and practice of accounting.
sentences.chinese: 会计理论和实践中普遍渗透着辨证唯物主义哲学思想。

sentences.english: Thinkers with such views were called materialists .
sentences.chinese: 持这种观点的思想家被称为唯物主义者。

sentences.english: The research on the civilian community helped Mark set the starting point of the theroy of historical materialism.
sentences.chinese: 马克思以市民社会入手来确立唯物史观的理论起点。

sentences.english: The study of the civil society has great significance in the foundation of the historical materialism.
sentences.chinese: 市民社会的研究对唯物史观的形成具有重要意义。

sentences.english: Promote materialist dialectics and oppose metaphysics and scholasticism .
sentences.chinese: 要提倡唯物辩证法，反对形而上学和烦琐哲学。

sentences.english: Antonio Labriola expounded on the historical materialism is creative.
sentences.chinese: 拉布里奥拉对唯物史观的阐发是富有创造性的。
唯心论和唯物论是对立的。

sentences.english: Engels pointed out that historical materialism is not only the world outlook but also the methodology.
sentences.chinese: 恩格斯指出，唯物史观不仅是世界视，而且是方法论。

sentences.english: Gerald was nettled by this implication of vulgar materialism.
sentences.chinese: 杰拉德被她话语中流露出的庸俗唯物主义惹恼了。

sentences.english: The naissance course of historical materialism in the foundation course of historical epistemology.
sentences.chinese: 唯物史观的诞生过程表现为历史认识论的确立过程。

definition: philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
the philosophy of materialism, doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
dialectical materialism

definition: theism (the belief in the existence of God)
metaphysics
epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
gnosticism, the philosophical doctrine that everything about the universe is knowable
dualism, belief that the universe is made of two different substance (e.g. mind and matter or good and evil)
historical materialism (Marx's theory of history)
pinyin: li4 shi3 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: agnosticism, the philosophical doctrine that some questions about the universe are in principle unanswerable
objective idealism (in Hegel's philosophy)

definition: dialectics/dialectic or Socratic method of debate
atheism
ontology
